title: New site ...
content:
It’s still unfortunately only an interim design while we’re too flat out to get to stuck into the re-design.

thoughts and feedback appreciated - on the site and any of the work.

[www.solid-creative.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)

cheers.

—————  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design, Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)

 [‹ Type Suggestions Needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27375 "Go to previous forum topic") [All The President's Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27434 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ratbaggy

comments.content:
One thing I noticed while browsing your ’Identity’ works, was the similarity between [your logo for ’liberté’](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.solid-creative.com/images/print/liberte_logo1.gif) and the ’Nestlé’ brand. _( Also [the ’Erwes Eesti’ logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.solid-creative.com/images/print/erwesEesti_logo.gif), slightly reminded me of [the ’Element’ mark](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.elementskateboards.com/), but that may just be me. :)_

Other than that I think I like the site itself. Its simple and clean.  
Nothing too fancy, or edgy. It works. And that sure is what it should do. :)

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042859/http:/www.dav.name/)

Hey there!

like the simplicity of the site but you do get af feeling of not quite finished...

Funny stuff to find a danish logo in your portfolio “I-Level”

:o)
